misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing St. Laurence Golf with a unique blend of power and precision. Known for his booming drives and the ability to shape the ball with a consistent power draw, Jussi brings an exciting dimension to the competition.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Jussi's consistent presence in past events—having participated in 4 editions—underscores his dedication and passion for the game. He is a formidable competitor renowned for his unwavering focus and determination on the course.

Although not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, the possibility of a last-minute entry remains. Fans and fellow competitors alike eagerly anticipate the potential return of Jussi and his signature power draw to the greens.
